patthana16.30:4.1: Savitakkasavicāraṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasavitakkasavicāro nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.30:5.1: Savitakkasavicāraṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naavitakkavicāramatto nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.30:5.3: Hetuyā aṭṭhavīsa, ārammaṇe aṭṭhavīsa, adhipatiyā ekūnavīsa … pe … purejāte āsevane ekūnavīsa … pe … avigate aṭṭhavīsa.
